QuestData.Title: Meet with Veruca Darkstream
QuestData.Description: Veruca Darkstream, one of the senior rogue trainers in Stormwind's SI:7, has sent word that he wants to speak with you. Head to Stormwind as soon as you can and look for her in the Training Hall south of Old Town.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Veruca Darkstream at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Veruca Darkstream at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
